q: shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. PM Microsoft has picked an executive with deep engineering and online experience to help build its presence in the nascent cloud computing market. Data Warehouse Appliance Promises Database Transparence, Mixed BI Workload, Massive Scalability Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future, said Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer , in a statement.
